Package Functions

 WorkcenterSequence (int numberOfMachines)

Detailed Description

Class WorkcenterSequence.
A WorkcenterSequence is an ordered array of machineSequences (machine sequences)
This array stores the sequence of jobs for each machine at the workstation The only member is the arraylist workcenterSequence.
The i-th position of workcenterSequence corresponds to the i-th machine sequence.
